item.title: WATCH: Parachutist rescued after getting caught on stadium roof
item.description: A parachutist taking part in a pre-game display at France's Stadium de Toulouse became caught on the roof, prompting firefighters to rescue him.

item.title: US stock futures slide amid historic rout in foreign markets
item.description: Key Asian stock markets tumbled upon opening on Monday as the world's reaction to President Donald Trump's tariffs campaign continued.

item.title: Jay North, TV's mischievous Dennis the Menace, dies at 73
item.description: Jay North, who starred as the towheaded mischief maker on TV’s “Dennis the Menace” for four seasons starting in 1959, has died

item.title: Former US Rep. Mia Love honored in Utah after brain cancer death
